{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Top up your pay as you go credit and get notifications when it gets low","View your contactless and Oyster journey history","Check your estimated cost for today's travel","See if you have incomplete journeys","Buy adult rate \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/travelcards-and-group-tickets\"\u003eTravelcards\u003c/a\u003e and \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/bus-and-tram-pass\"\u003eBus \u0026 Tram Passes\u003c/a\u003e valid between seven days and 12 months","Get notifications for when your ticket expires","Apply for refunds","Pay unpaid fares","Manage multiple season tickets and cards","Use our free \u003ca href=\"/fares-and-payments/fares2018/how-to-pay-and-where-to-buy-tickets-and-oyster/tfl-oyster-and-contactless-app\"\u003eTfL Oyster and contactless app\u003c/a\u003e "]}
{"template":"bulletlist","items":[" \u003ca href=\"https://contactless.tfl.gov.uk\"\u003eSign in to your contactless and Oyster account\u003c/a\u003e "]}
When you create a contactless and Oyster account and add your contactless or Oyster card, TfL, its subsidiaries and service providers use your personal data for:
{"template":"bulletlist","items":["Customer service and administration","Provision of travel related information","Seeing how customers use our products","Fraud prevention"]}
If you use your contactless or Oyster card on National Rail services, you're also authorising TfL to share your personal data with relevant Train Operating Companies (TOCs).
In certain circumstances, TfL and relevant TOCs may also share your personal data with the police and other law enforcement agencies for the prevention and detection of crime.
